item.title: Join us at Clarke Quay for the Once Upon a Nightmare free street party to celebrate Halloween
item.description:
Clarke Quay is hosting “Once Upon A Nightmare,” a street party they’re calling the most frightening Halloween event of the year. The event, which is free to attend, will be hosted by popular radio DJs Justin Ang and Vernon A from 98.7FMâ€™s Muttons On The Move. Source: Clarke Quay. Attendees can enjoy live music from local band Enigma and participate in themed games for a chance to win prizes. Guests are encouraged to dress up in their most twisted and imaginative interpretations of fairytale characters...

item.title: Zombies will be all over Clarke Quay this Halloween
item.description:
Source: Clarke Quay. Zombiefest for 2019. This Halloween, enter Clarke Quay at your own risk and prepare to become a zombie. From October 31st to November 2nd, Clarke Quay presents FOX The Walking Dead Halloween 2019, transforming the Singapore riverside into a zombie colony. Expect roaming walkers, themed decorations, games, and live music to thrill attendees. Clarke Quay’s FOX The Walking Dead Halloween celebrates the series’ highly anticipated October return...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/zombies-will-be-all-over-clarke-quay-this-halloween/
